abstract: Intel is betting that combining McAfee’s security software with its hardware will give it a leg up. But investors who knocked down Intel’s shares are rightly skeptical the chip maker can pull it off.
snippet: Intel is betting that combining McAfee’s security software with its hardware will give it a leg up. But investors who knocked down Intel’s shares are rightly skeptical the chip maker can pull it off.

headline.main: For Intel, a Merger of Fish and Fowl
